payload.description: Fix webkit SecureTokenStore decryption failure. Diagnostic shows: [SecureTokenStore] Decryption failed: OperationError causing 401 Unauthorized on all API calls after login. The login succeeds but stored tokens cannot be decrypted for subsequent requests in webkit browser. Investigate: 1) Check if SubtleCrypto API works differently in webkit, 2) Check if encryption key generation/storage differs, 3) Add webkit-specific fallback or fix the encryption method. Also check browserDetection.js for Safari/webkit handling. The token store must work across all browsers.
